DINNER MENU.name: Fried Calamari
DINNER MENU.desc: Delicious, tender, crispy, & crunchy calamari served with mild or hot marinara sauce for dipping

DINNER MENU.name: Fried Roman Artichokes
DINNER MENU.desc: Crispy-fried baby artichokes with lemon and salsa verde

DINNER MENU.name: Crab-Stuffed Jalapeño Popper
DINNER MENU.desc: Fresh jalapeno peppers stuffed with lump crab meat & cheese, wrapped in bacon & smoked. Glazed with a tangy homemade BBQ sauce

DINNER MENU.name: Mamas Meatballs and Sausage
DINNER MENU.desc: Our homemade meatballs are a delicious combination of ground beef, garlic, cheese & bread served with sweet Italian sausage simmered in Mamas meat sauce

DINNER MENU.name: Grilled Bruschetta with Fig Jam, Gorgonzola cheese & Prosciutto
DINNER MENU.desc: Baked artisan bread char-grilled topped with delicate fig jam, gorgonzola cheese & sliced prosciutto

DINNER MENU.name: Prince Edward Island Mussels
DINNER MENU.desc: Fresh plump & juicy Canadian mussels simmered in a white wine, garlic, shallots & tomato sauce

DINNER MENU.name: Panini Bay House Special
DINNER MENU.desc: Fresh crisp romaine lettuce served with our balsamic vinaigrette, pimento olives, plum tomatoes & red onion confit

DINNER MENU.name: Caesar Salad
DINNER MENU.desc: Crisp romaine, our homemade Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons & parmigiana reggiano cheese

DINNER MENU.name: Baby Greens & Goat Cheese
DINNER MENU.desc: Baby greens, creamy goat cheese, red onion confit & balsamic vinaigrette

DINNER MENU.name: Fresh Mozzarella and Tomato Salad
DINNER MENU.desc: Chunks of fresh mozzarella, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion confit & balsamic vinaigrette. Served with grilled crostini

DINNER MENU.name: Creamy Shrimp Linguine
DINNER MENU.desc: Sautéed shrimp in a pink cream sauce flavored with white wine, prosciutto, shallots & parmesan cheese. Served over linguine pasta

DINNER MENU.name: Authentic Bolognese
DINNER MENU.desc: Ground veal, pork & beef slowly simmered with white wine, prosciutto, onion, carrots, cream & parmigiana reggiano cheese

DINNER MENU.name: Mamas Meat Sauce or Marinara
DINNER MENU.desc: Your choice of pasta with our deliciously rich slow simmered braised meat sauce or just marinara sauce. Dusted with pecorino romano cheese. Meat sauce 18 Marinara sauce

DINNER MENU.name: White or Red Clam Sauce
DINNER MENU.desc: Fresh local little neck clams from Parsons seafood, simmered in extra virgin olive oil, white wine & garlic. Served over imported linguini pasta
